item.title: Restore a project collections of azure devops to another instance
item.description: I spent almost a whole afternoon today to restore a project collections . It doesnâ€™t go well. Azure devops server might supports SQL Server express version. and I choose the wrong way to do that. After several trial, I figure out the way to restore a project collections of azure devops to another instance. The steps is as following. install sql server (not sure if sql server express is compatible)
